name: immich-person-to-album

scripts.test: podman build --build-arg PACKAGE_VERSION=$(npm pkg get version | xargs) --format docker -t immich-person-test .. && podman run --init -it -p=3000:3000 --userns=keep-id -v ../data:/data:Z --restart=always immich-person-test

author: Alan Grainger
description: Automatically add people to an album, so you can then share the album with another user.
